books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: In this second installment of the Guardians trilogy, Sawyer brings the group to the island of Capri, where he’s drawn to the mermaid Annika.
books.name: BAY OF SIGHS

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: The counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath searches for an informant who has compromised an American mission in Syria.
books.name: FOREIGN AGENT

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Bad-guy Brady acquires psychic powers in the conclusion of the Bill Hodges trilogy.
books.name: END OF WATCH

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: Sparks fly as a celebrity chef’s ex-wives pile into a small cabin in Nantucket to join his widow for the reading of his will.
books.name: HERE'S TO US

books.author: by Grant Blackwood
books.description: A secretive German organization is trying to kill Tom Clancy’s character Jack Ryan Jr. (Clancy died in 2013.)
books.name: TOM CLANCY: DUTY AND HONOR

books.author: by Emma Cline
books.description: In the summer of 1969, a California teenager is drawn to a Manson-like cult.
books.name: THE GIRLS

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Alex Cross thinks he's seeing things when a killer long thought dead returns to action.
books.name: CROSS KILL

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: After the death of Will Traynor, Louisa Clark joins a grief support group that may lead her to new love.
books.name: AFTER YOU

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Noah Hawley
books.description: After a private jet crashes, a firestorm of media madness ensues.
books.name: BEFORE THE FALL

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: In a sequel to “Memory Man,” Amos Decker, a detective with an extraordinary memory, investigates the case of a convicted killer who wins a last-minute reprieve.
books.name: THE LAST MILE

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by James Patterson with Max DiLallo
books.description: Human mutation proves a curse and a blessing after another siege of beasts.
books.name: ZOO 2
